Place your image files here with the following filenames (used by the app):

- avatar.jpg        -> profile avatar
- ux-post.jpg       -> image for UX blog post
- oop-post.jpg      -> image for OOP blog post
- cert1.jpg         -> certificate 1 image
- cert2.jpg         -> certificate 2 image

After adding images, run the dev server (`npm run dev`) and open http://localhost:3002/ to preview.
